content.data:
[Y]Letters Bag
[W]Real post, real opinions, real tea
[W]stains.
[c][m.]
[W]Readers ask about sticky keys, floppy
[W]belts and where to begin with
[W]assembler.
[W]Best advice this week: write tiny
[W]routines and test on every change.
[c][m.]
[G]- Most asked: joystick choices.
[G]- Best tip: label every disk.
[G]- Most honest letter: I broke it by
[G]rushing.
[m][m-]
[Y]MAIL ROOM
[C]If your SPACE bar sticks, clean gently
[C]and keep cola away.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
